com.example.c301_w16_g5.c301_w16_g5

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.c301_w16_g5.c301_w16_g5.SearchController

  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchController handles calls to objects and methods inside the ElasticSearchBackend class.
    Author:
    Alex
    See Also:
    Chicken, User, Notification, Bid, ElasticSearchBackend

        Returns:
